about: Beautiful chalet in the Mont-Tremblant area for rent ! The chalet includes:
includes1: 4 big recently renovated rooms, in excellent condition
includes5: A terrain with 2 ponds and 20 acres of forest for strolls
please_note: PLEASE NOTE: To maintain the great condition of the chalet, please note that it is non-smoking and no animals inside the chalet. Also, please abstain from irresponsible partying.
reservations_spec: Contact us to rent it for the low price of $125 per week day, and $300 per week-end day!
reservations_text: To make a reservation, please contact Romeo:
restrictions1: Please be sure to include your full name
restrictions2: Please include the start and end dates for your reservation
restrictions3: The reservation may be for up to 8 people
restrictions4: The reservation must be for at least 3 nights
